title.en: Monthly Chronicle of the Qin-Chu Interregnum

sentences.zh: 太史公讀秦楚之際，曰：初作難，發於陳涉；

translations.literal: Grand Historian read Qin Chu between, said: Initially made difficulty, arose from Chen She;
translations.idiomatic: The Grand Historian read of the Qin-Chu interregnum and said: The initial uprising began with Chen She;

translations.literal: Tyrannical cruel extinguished Qin, from Xiang clan;
translations.idiomatic: Tyranny and cruelty extinguished Qin, from the Xiang clan;

sentences.zh: 撥亂誅暴，平定海內，卒踐帝祚，成於漢家。

translations.literal: Eliminated chaos executed tyrants, pacified within seas, finally stepped imperial throne, accomplished at Han house.
translations.idiomatic: Eliminated chaos and executed tyrants, pacified the realm, finally ascended the imperial throne, accomplished by the Han house.

translations.literal: Five years between, commands three changed.
translations.idiomatic: Within five years, the commands changed three times.

sentences.zh: 自生民以來，未始有受命若斯之亟

translations.literal: From living people since, never had received mandate like this urgent
translations.idiomatic: Since the beginning of civilization, never has there been a mandate received so urgently

translations.literal: The Grand Historian read of the Qin-Chu interregnum and said: The initial uprising began with Chen She; Tyranny and cruelty extinguished Qin, from the Xiang clan; Eliminated chaos and executed tyrants, pacified the realm, finally ascended the imperial throne, accomplished by the Han house. Within five years, the commands changed three times. Since the beginning of civilization, never has there been a mandate received so urgently

sentences.zh: 昔虞、夏之興，積善累功數十年，德洽百姓，攝行政事，考之于天，然後在位。

translations.literal: Former Yu, Xia rise, accumulated virtue piled merit several decades, virtue permeated hundred clans, acted administered government affairs, examined by heaven, then in position.
translations.idiomatic: In former times, when Yu and Xia rose, they accumulated virtue and piled up merit for several decades, their virtue permeated the people, they acted and administered government affairs, were examined by heaven, and only then took position.

sentences.zh: 湯、武之王，乃由契、后稷修仁行義十餘世，不期而會孟津八百諸侯，猶以為未可，其后乃放弒。

translations.literal: Tang, Wu kingship, then from Jie, Hou Ji cultivated benevolence practiced righteousness ten more generations, unexpectedly met Mengjin eight hundred feudal lords, still considered not acceptable, their after then banished assassinated.
translations.idiomatic: Tang and Wu's kingship came from Jie and Hou Ji cultivating benevolence and practicing righteousness for over ten generations. Unexpectedly they met at Mengjin with eight hundred feudal lords, but still considered it unacceptable. Only afterward did they banish and assassinate.

sentences.zh: 秦起襄公，章於文、繆，獻、孝之後，稍以蠶食六國，百有餘載，至始皇乃能并冠帶之倫。

translations.literal: Qin arose Xiang duke, eminent at Wen, Mu, Xian, Xiao after, gradually silkworm eating six states, hundred more years, to First Emperor then able unite capped belted peers.
translations.idiomatic: Qin arose with Duke Xiang, eminent during Wen and Mu, after Xian and Xiao, gradually nibbling away at the six states for over a hundred years, until the First Emperor was able to unite the capped and belted peers.

sentences.zh: 以德若彼，用力如此，蓋一統若斯之難也。

translations.literal: Used virtue like that, used force like this, indeed unification like this difficult also.
translations.idiomatic: Using virtue like that, using force like this - indeed unification is as difficult as this.

translations.literal: In former times, when Yu and Xia rose, they accumulated virtue and piled up merit for several decades, their virtue permeated the people, they acted and administered government affairs, were examined by heaven, and only then took position. Tang and Wu's kingship came from Jie and Hou Ji cultivating benevolence and practicing righteousness for over ten generations. Unexpectedly they met at Mengjin with eight hundred feudal lords, but still considered it unacceptable. Only afterward did they banish and assassinate. Qin arose with Duke Xiang, eminent during Wen and Mu, after Xian and Xiao, gradually nibbling away at the six states for over a hundred years, until the First Emperor was able to unite the capped and belted peers. Using virtue like that, using force like this - indeed unification is as difficult as this.

sentences.zh: 秦既稱帝，患兵革不休，以有諸侯也，於是無尺土之封，墮壞名城，銷鋒鏑，鉏豪桀，維萬世之安。

translations.literal: Qin already called emperor, worried weapons armor not cease, because had feudal lords also, thereupon no inch soil enfeoffment, destroyed famous cities, melted weapons arrows, hoed heroes bullies, maintained ten thousand generations peace.
translations.idiomatic: Qin having become emperor, worried that weapons and armor would never cease because of the feudal lords. Thereupon there were no inch of soil enfeoffments, famous cities were destroyed, weapons and arrows melted, heroes and bullies hoed out, to maintain peace for ten thousand generations.

sentences.zh: 然王跡之興，起於閭巷，合從討伐，軼於三代，鄉秦之禁，適足以資賢者為驅除難耳。
故憤發其所為天下雄，安在無土不王。
非大聖孰能當此受命而帝者乎？

translations.literal: Qin having become emperor, worried that weapons and armor would never cease because of the feudal lords. Thereupon there were no inch of soil enfeoffments, famous cities were destroyed, weapons and arrows melted, heroes and bullies hoed out, to maintain peace for ten thousand generations.

cells.content: 二。葛嬰為涉徇九江，立襄彊為楚王。
cells.literal: Two. Ge Ying for She toured Jiujiang, established Xiang Qiang as Chu king.
cells.idiomatic: Second day. Ge Ying toured Jiujiang for She, established Xiang Qiang as Chu king.

cells.content: 武臣始至邯鄲，自立為趙王，始。
cells.literal: Wu Chen first arrived Handan, self-established as Zhao king, beginning.
cells.idiomatic: Wu Chen first arrived at Handan, self-established as Zhao king - beginning.

cells.literal: Ninth month. Chu troops arrived Xi.
cells.idiomatic: Ninth month. Chu troops arrived at Xi.

cells.content: 三。周文兵至戲，敗。而葛嬰聞涉王，即殺彊。
cells.literal: Three. Zhou Wen troops arrived Xi, defeated. Yet Ge Ying heard She king, immediately killed Qiang.
cells.idiomatic: Third day. Zhou Wen's troops arrived at Xi and were defeated. Yet Ge Ying heard of She as king and immediately killed Qiang.

cells.literal: Xiang Liang styled Martial Faith Lord.
cells.idiomatic: Xiang Liang styled himself Martial Faith Lord.

cells.content: 齊王田儋始。儋，狄人。諸田宗彊。從弟榮，榮弟橫。
cells.literal: Qi king Tian Dan beginning. Dan, Di person. Various Tian clan strong. Younger brother Rong, Rong younger brother Heng.
cells.idiomatic: Qi king Tian Dan beginning. Dan was a Di person. The various Tian clan were strong. Younger brother Rong, Rong's younger brother Heng.

cells.content: 韓廣為趙略地至薊，自立為燕王始。
cells.literal: Han Guang for Zhao seized territory to Ji, self-established as Yan king beginning.
cells.idiomatic: Han Guang seized territory for Zhao up to Ji, self-established as Yan king - beginning.

cells.content: 魏王咎始。咎在陳，不得歸國。
cells.literal: Wei king Jiu beginning. Jiu at Chen, unable return state.
cells.idiomatic: Wei king Jiu beginning. Jiu was at Chen, unable to return to his state.

cells.literal: Two. Dan what rose, killed Di magistrate self king.
cells.idiomatic: Second day. When Dan rose, he killed the Di magistrate and made himself king.

cells.content: 二。擊胡陵、方與，破秦監軍。
cells.literal: Two. Attacked Hu Ling, Fang Yu, broke Qin supervising army.
cells.idiomatic: Second day. Attacked Hu Ling and Fang Yu, defeated the Qin supervising army.

cells.content: 四。李良殺武臣，張耳、陳餘走。
cells.literal: Four. Li Liang killed Wu Chen, Zhang Er, Chen Yu fled.
cells.idiomatic: Fourth day. Li Liang killed Wu Chen, Zhang Er and Chen Yu fled.

cells.content: 三。殺泗水守。拔薛西。周市東略地豐沛閒。
cells.literal: Three. Killed Si Shui guard. Pulled Xue west. Zhou Shi east seized territory Feng Pei between.
cells.idiomatic: Third day. Killed the Si Shui guard. Pulled Xue west. Zhou Shi east seized territory between Feng and Pei.

cells.content: 三。齊、趙共立周市，市不肯，曰「必立魏咎」云。
cells.literal: Three. Qi, Zhao together established Zhou Shi, Shi not willing, said 'must establish Wei Jiu' thus.
cells.idiomatic: Third day. Qi and Zhao together established Zhou Shi, but Shi was not willing, saying 'must establish Wei Jiu'.

cells.content: 四。雍齒叛沛公，以豐降魏。沛公還攻豐，不能下。
cells.literal: Four. Yong Chi rebelled Pei duke, with Feng surrendered Wei. Pei duke returned attacked Feng, could not take.
cells.idiomatic: Fourth day. Yong Chi rebelled against Pei duke, surrendered Feng to Wei. Pei duke returned and attacked Feng, but could not take it.

cells.content: 五。涉將召平矯拜項梁為楚柱國，急西擊秦。
趙王歇始，張耳、陳餘立之。
五。讓景駒以擅自王不請我。
五。沛公聞景駒王在留，往從，與擊秦軍碭西。
五。章邯已破涉，圍咎臨濟。
六。梁渡江，陳嬰、黥布皆屬。
六。景駒使公孫慶讓齊，誅慶。
六。攻下碭，收得兵六千，與故凡九千人。
七。攻拔下邑，遂擊豐，豐不拔。聞項梁兵眾，往請擊豐。
八。梁擊殺景駒、秦嘉，遂入薛，兵十餘萬眾。
八。沛公如薛見項梁，梁益沛公卒五千，擊豐，拔之。雍齒奔魏。
八。臨濟急，周市如齊、楚請救。
楚懷王始，都盱台，故懷王孫，梁立之。
十。梁求楚懷王孫，得之民閒，立為楚王。
十。儋救臨濟，章邯殺田儋。榮走東阿。
十。沛公如薛，共立楚懷王。
十一。天大雨，三月不見星。
齊立田假為王，秦急圍東阿。
十一。沛公與項羽北救東阿，破秦軍濮陽，東屠城陽。
十二。救東阿，破秦軍，乘勝至定陶，項梁有驕色。
楚救榮，得解歸，逐田假，立儋子市為齊王，始。
十二。沛公與項羽西略地，斬三川守李由於雍丘。
十三。章邯破殺項梁於定陶，項羽恐，還軍彭城。
二。田假走楚，楚趨齊救趙。田榮以假故，不肯，謂「楚殺假乃出兵。」項羽怒田榮。
十三。沛公聞項梁死，還軍，從懷王，軍於碭。
魏豹自立為魏王，都平陽，始。
懷王封項羽於魯，為次將，屬宋義，北救趙。
十。秦軍圍歇鉅鹿，陳餘出收兵。
十四。懷王封沛公為武安侯，將碭郡兵西，約先至咸陽王之。
十一。章邯破邯鄲，徙其民於河內。
四。齊將田都叛榮，往助項羽救趙。
十五。攻破東郡尉及王離軍於成武南。
三。羽矯殺宋義，將其兵渡河救鉅鹿。
四。大破秦軍鉅鹿下，諸侯將皆屬項羽。
六。故齊王建孫田安下濟北，從項羽救趙。
十七。（救趙）至栗，得皇訢、武蒲軍。與秦軍戰，破之。
十四。張耳怒陳餘，棄將印去。
十九。得彭越軍昌邑，襲陳留。用酈食其策，軍得積粟。
二十。攻開封，破秦將楊熊，熊走滎陽，秦斬熊以徇。
八。楚急攻章邯，章邯恐，使長史欣歸秦請兵，趙高讓之。
二十一。攻潁陽，略韓地，北絕河津。
九。趙高欲誅欣，欣恐，亡走，告章邯謀叛秦。
十。章邯與楚約降，未定，項羽許而擊之。
二十三。攻南陽守齮，破之陽城郭東。
十一。項羽與章邯期殷虛，章邯等已降，與盟，以邯為雍王。
二十四。降下南陽，封其守齮。
十二。以秦降都尉翳、長史欣為上將，將秦降軍。
二十一。趙王歇留國。陳餘亡居南皮。
二十六。攻下嶢及藍田。以留侯策，不戰皆降。
十四。項羽將諸侯兵四十餘萬，行略地，西至於河南。
二十三。張耳從楚西入秦。
二十七。漢元年，秦王子嬰降。沛公入破咸陽，平秦，還軍霸上，待諸侯約。
十五。從項羽略地，遂入關
十五。羽詐阬殺秦降卒二十萬人於新安。
二十八。沛公出令三章，秦民大悅。
十六。至關中，誅秦王子嬰，屠燒咸陽。分天下，立諸侯。
十八。項羽怨榮，分齊為三國。
二十九。與項羽有纳，見之戲下，講解。羽倍約，分關中為四國。
二十九。臧荼從入，分燕為二國。
九。義帝元年。諸侯尊懷王為義帝。
十七。項籍自立為西楚霸王。
西楚主伯，項籍始，為天下主命，主十八王。
二十七。。王趙歇始，故趙王。
三十一。王韓廣始，故燕王。
二十二。王韓成始，故韓將。
三。諸侯罷戲下兵，皆之國。
三十七。臧荼擊廣無終，滅之。
歇以陳餘為代王，故成安君。
八。項籍擊榮，走平原平原民殺之。
項籍立故齊王田假為齊王。
二。田榮弟橫反城陽，擊假，走楚，楚殺假。
三。項羽以兵三萬破漢兵五十六萬。
齊王田廣始。廣，榮子，橫立之。
四月。王伐楚至彭城，壞走。
六月。王入關，立太子。復如滎陽。
屬漢，為隴西、北地、中地郡。
十二。布身降漢，地屬項籍。
十一。漢將韓信破殺龍且。
二十一。漢將韓信擊殺廣。
十二。徙王楚，屬漢，為四郡。
正月。。殺項籍，天下平，諸侯臣屬漢。
四。韓王信徙王代，都馬邑。
二月。甲午，王更號，即皇帝位於定陶。
衡山王吳芮為為長沙王。
九。王得故項羽將鍾離辚，斬之以聞。
